content.content: Berlin fork dramatically increased gas prices for some dapps. We at SKALE saw 10-30% gas increases across our calls (happily the fork coincided with a gas optimization update of our code)
content.GPT-summary: The post discusses the recent Berlin fork and its impact on gas prices for some dapps, including SKALE. SKALE saw a 10-30% increase in gas prices, but fortunately, their code had been optimized for gas usage. The post also serves as an advertisement for SKALE and invites questions about the proposal. Additionally, the post provides constructive criticism of the Berlin fork's impact on gas prices.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party or author is advertising proposal
